checkConstraint.constraint: ((((genbank_status)::text = 'htgs1'::text) OR ((genbank_status)::text = 'htgs2'::text) OR ((genbank_status)::text = 'htgs3'::text) OR ((genbank_status)::text = 'htgs4'::text) OR ((genbank_status)::text = ''::text) OR (genbank_status IS NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: chk_bac_status_genbank_status

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((status)::text = 'not_sequenced'::text) OR ((status)::text = 'in_progress'::text) OR ((status)::text = 'complete'::text) OR ((status)::text = ''::text) OR (status IS NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: chk_bac_status_status

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((genbank_status)::text = 'htgs1'::text) OR ((genbank_status)::text = 'htgs2'::text) OR ((genbank_status)::text = 'htgs3'::text) OR ((genbank_status)::text = 'htgs4'::text) OR ((genbank_status)::text = ''::text) OR (genbank_status IS NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: chk_bac_status_log_genbank_status

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((status)::text = 'not_sequenced'::text) OR ((status)::text = 'in_progress'::text) OR ((status)::text = 'complete'::text) OR ((status)::text = ''::text) OR (status IS NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: chk_bac_status_log_status

table.name: clone_il_mapping_bin_log
table.remarks: linking table showing which phenome.genotype_region a given clone has been mapped to. also provides a modification history with its is_current and created columns

table.name: clone_validation_log
table.remarks: table showing which clones have been validated by a variety of methods. columns may be added to this without warning. details about each validation experiment should be written into the comment field on the detail page for the clone

table.name: clone_verification_log
table.remarks: table showing which clones have been validated by a variety of methods. columns may be added to this without warning. details about each validation experiment should be written into the comment field on the detail page for the clone

table.name: sp_clone_il_mapping_segment_log
table.remarks: linking table showing which phenome.individual IL line a given clone has been mapped to. also provides a modification history with is_current and created columns

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((user_type)::text = 'user'::text) OR ((user_type)::text = 'submitter'::text) OR ((user_type)::text = 'curator'::text) OR ((user_type)::text = 'sequencer'::text) OR ((user_type)::text = ''::text) OR (user_type IS NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: chk_sp_login_user_type

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((disabled IS NOT NULL) AND (cookie_string IS NULL)) OR (disabled IS NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: if_disabled_no_cookie_for_you

table.name: sp_project_il_mapping_clone_log
table.remarks: linking table showing which sp_project is currently assigned to map a given clone to the zamir IL lines. also provides a modification history with is_current and created columns

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((type)::text = 'PI'::text) OR ((type)::text = 'co-PI'::text) OR ((type)::text = 'Member'::text) OR ((type)::text = ''::text) OR (type IS NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: chk_sp_project_person_type
